scripts.yaml-to-json: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const yaml=require('js-yaml'); fs.writeFileSync('mockApi/db_stage.json', JSON.stringify(yaml.load(fs.readFileSync('mockApi/db_back_up.yml', 'utf8')), null, 2));"
scripts.start-json-api: npm run kill-3000 && npm run yaml-to-json && json-server --watch mockApi/db_stage.json --port 3000
scripts.start-and-test: start-server-and-test 'npm run start-json-api' http://localhost:3000 'npm run test:store && npm run test:petstore'
